channel.title: Client java error when i compile
channel.description: when i compile on my server this error comes up- public int fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {, it points to p in public and say illegal start of an expression it looks like this- public int fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^,wat i do??? and is it public int or void cause i changed acouple times and forgot wich one,plzz help if u can!!!

item.source: Client java error when i compile

item.title: Client java error when i compile
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote="-ballin2005, post:7, topic:63986"]@echo off cls :menu title Runserver + Compiler version 1.1 project16 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver if exist .server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac5 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe" goto compile2 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe" goto compile2 :javacerror cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download echo the newest JDK 5.0 Update. pause cls goto menu[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 06:39:22 PM[/size][hr]try it =][/quote]That wont do anything because its a error, that will just give him a diffrent compiler, Make sure that you didnt leave any { without a } and vise versa.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ballin20051 -ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin20051 wrote:

@echo off cls :menu title Runserver + Compiler version 1.1 project16 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver if exist .server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac5 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe" goto compile2 set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe" goto compile2 :javacerror cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download echo the newest JDK 5.0 Update. pause cls goto menu[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 06:39:22 PM[/size][hr]try it =]
